0.08.name: wordpress/no-blog-clients
0.08.description:
This plugin removes two actions that produce link elements in the header of all your Wordpress URL locations. These two link elements are the resulting HTML of the actions:

The xmlrpc.php link instructs blog clients where to find the Wordpress XML-RPC interface via really simple discovery (RSD). The second link to wlwmanifest.xml reveals the location of your Wordpress administration dashboard, the location of the edit post script and manage comments scripts.
